text: Bronisław Dankowski (22 August 1944 – 2 December 2020) was a Polish politician. He was a member of the Sejm from 1997 to 2005. He was a member of the Democratic Left Alliance. Dankowski died on 2 December 2020 at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Polish politicians
title: Bronisław Dankowski
